participant_1.background:
My hands were always greasy from working on cars.
I showed a group of tourists the best spots to view the Grand Canyon.
I am a student who is trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby.
I love to play soccer in the park because it is a great way to stay active and connect with my friends.
Last year I moved into a new home that perfectly fit my needs.

participant_2.background:
I sometimes eat candy because it reminds me of my childhood.
I love listening to music while I eat my tuna fish salad.
my favorite coffee is french vanilla.
i listen to classical music.
I wash my uniforms every week because I work at an animal clinic.

content.text: Hey! I'm a new student at the community college here in town.
Welcome! What are you studying?
I'm trying to change careers and become a mechanic.
That's awesome! My dad was a mechanic for 30 years.
Really? I've always loved cars, so I think it's a good fit for me.
That's great! What made you decide to quit smoking?
I have a baby on the way, and I want to be a good role model for her.
That's so sweet! Congratulations! I'm sure you'll be a great dad.
Thanks! I'm really excited.
I'm sure you'll be great! What are your favorite types of music?
I like all kinds of music, but I especially love classical.
Same! I love listening to classical music while I eat my tuna fish salad.
That's funny, I do the same thing!
It's the best way to enjoy a delicious meal.
I agree!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love playing soccer in the park. It's a great way to stay active and connect with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I used to play soccer when I was younger.
It really is! I love playing with my friends.
I'm sure you're a great soccer player!
Thanks! I try my best.
I'm sure you're great
